item.title: Aws Lab Series Build and Deploy Rest Api
item.description: First of all we have figure out our requirements and materials that we have. Overview of requirements Overview of the API Service Our Rest API service is written in NodeJS Use Relational Database There is a job queue inside the service The service store image on disk User can upload images via this service User data must be encrypted What system needs We have a domain on godaddy and plan to use: api.
